entry.title: Dowdy indicted for fatal crash with UCC softball bus
entry.summary: Johnathan Dowdy, 32, was arraigned on 25 charges in a crash that killed two UCC softball players and injured eight others. He remains in jail on $2 million bail. Prosecutors allege reckless driving with extreme indifference. His next court date is set for May 21.

entry.title: Boil Water Advisory Issued for Glendale Residents After Main Break
entry.summary: Glendale residents are under a boil water advisory after a main break on Azalea Glen Road. The issue was fixed Wednesday night, but water must be boiled until test results confirm it’s safe. Call 832-2106 for questions.

entry.title: The Rise of The Roseburg Receiver: From Local Scanner Feed to Regional Powerhouse
entry.summary: The Roseburg Receiver has become the fastest-growing scanner community in Douglas County, delivering real-time fire, medical, police, and weather updates. With nearly 15,000 members and growing, it's now a vital source for local emergency info and wildfire reporting.

entry.title: Douglas County Sheriff’s Office Mourns the Loss of K9 Ozzy
entry.summary: Douglas County K9 Ozzy has passed away following health complications. The 8-year-old German Shepherd served faithfully since 2020, assisting in 88 apprehensions. He is remembered for his bravery, loyalty, and lifesaving actions alongside Deputy Barden.
